fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Building capital market union, Action plan on building sustainable finance, ESA's review, Risk reduction package (CRDV, CRR2, BRRD2), Prudential Review for investment firms, Market infrastructure & EMIR regulation, Corporate Law, Fit & Proper, MIFID/MIFIR, MAR/MAD, PRIIPS, review of AIFMD,  Benchmark regulation & building a new Risk free rate, Review of Solvency II, Propose a plan on European Personal Pension Funds, EC proposal on cross border distribution of dunds
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: ESBG & EACB (via BPCE), EBF through FBF, EFAMA (via Natixis Investment Management), Insurance Europe through FFA (via Natixis Assurances), AFEP, AMAFI, AFME, ISDA, ICMA.
goals__remit:
Natixis is the international corporate and investment banking, asset management, insurance and financial services arm of Group BPCE, the second-largest banking group in France. 
 
For more information refer to our website www.natixis.com
